enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.fishin: Gives a chance to catch additional items from fishing.
Gives a chance to catch additional items from fishing.
wonderfulenchantments.fanatic_level_up: You have become greater Fishing Fanatic!
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.human_: Increases the damage against villagers, pillagers, witches and other players.
Increases the damage against villagers, pillagers, witches and other players.
Gives a chance to completely avoid any kind of damage.
Gives a chance to completely avoid any kind of damage.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.enligh: Increases the experience gained from any source.
Increases the experience gained from any source.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.phoeni: Falls from a height cause a wave of fire to release, damaging and setting nearby enemies on fire. Also while you hold the sneak key (def. SHIFT) you will jump higher!
Falls from a height cause a wave of fire to release, damaging and setting nearby enemies on fire. Also while you hold the sneak key (def. SHIFT) you will jump higher!
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.puffer: Attacks will inflict several debuffs to targets.
Attacks will inflict several debuffs to targets.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.immort: You will cheat death on fatal hit.
You will cheat death on fatal hit.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.gotta_: Increases the digging speed the longer you hold the left mouse button.
Increases the digging speed the longer you hold the left mouse button.
Gives a chance to steal positive effects or health from enemies.
Gives a chance to steal positive effects or health from enemies.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.magic_: Protects against magical damage including Evoker Fangs, Guardians and Instant Damage potions.
Protects against magical damage including Evoker Fangs, Guardians and Instant Damage potions.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.horse_: Reduces the amount of damage the horse receives.
Reduces the amount of damage the horse receives.
Creates a path of ice when walking over water with a horse.
Creates a path of ice when walking over water with a horse.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.teleki: Adds the drops of destroyed blocks directly to the player's inventory.
Adds the drops of destroyed blocks directly to the player's inventory.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.absorb: Shields absorb all negative effects at the expense of durability.
Shields absorb all negative effects at the expense of durability.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.hunter: Increases mob drops and causes damage to scale with distance.
Increases mob drops and causes damage to scale with distance.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.elder_: After a successful hit, enemies are inflicted with a laser beam that can't be dodged or blocked.
After a successful hit, enemies are inflicted with a laser beam that can't be dodged or blocked.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.harves: Gives the option of right-click harvesting and the chance to grow nearby crops.
Gives the option of right-click harvesting and the chance to grow nearby crops.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.mithri: Reduces the damage from certain negative effects and gives Absorption whenever negative effects are applied.
Reduces the damage from certain negative effects and gives Absorption whenever negative effects are applied.
wonderfulenchantments.mithridatism_level: You have developed greater resilience to negative effects!
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.fuse_c: Nearby explosions will not destroy blocks or deal damage.
Nearby explosions will not destroy blocks or deal damage.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.sixth_: Highlights nearby monsters after standing still for a while.
Highlights nearby monsters after standing still for a while.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.death_: Increases damage dealt equal to the percentage of health lost.
Increases damage dealt equal to the percentage of health lost.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.guardi: Redirects part of the damage from tamed animals and villagers to the player and applies damage reduction to them.
Redirects part of the damage from tamed animals and villagers to the player and applies damage reduction to them.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.fatigu: Effectively reduces the player's speed of everything.
Effectively reduces the player's speed of everything.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.vampir: Weakens and sets the player on fire when in daylight. Strengthens Leech enchantment.
Weakens and sets the player on fire when in daylight. Strengthens Leech enchantment.
enchantment.wonderfulenchantments.corros: Gradually destroys armor and inflicts damage to the user when in water.
Gradually destroys armor and inflicts damage to the user when in water.
item.wonderfulenchantments.wonderful_boo: You can increase enchanting energy with Lapis Lazuli in Crafting Table.
Press the right mouse button to transmute into a enchanted book while holding it...
advancements.wonderfulenchantments.schol: Acquire the Enlightenment II on all armor pieces
advancements.wonderfulenchantments.nothi: Obtain the next level of the Fishing Fanatic even though it is raining
